What's the best way to wash your hands?
Correct Answer: By using soap and water, because the soap helps lifts more dirt and bacteria off your hands.
Choice 2: With no soap and only cold water to kill any bacteria on your hands.
Choice 3: It doesn't matter. Water by itself s just as good as water and soap together.

Question: Which virus or disease was not discovered during the past 100 years?
What is herd immunity?
Correct Answer: When most of the population is immune to an infectious disease and this protects the people who have not yet had it.
Choice 1: When the people who are sick from an infectious disease isolate themselves in a community, called a "herd,"  to protect those who are not yet sick.
Choice 2: High Estimate of Residual Disease (HERD) Immunity
Choice 3: When doctors form groups, called "herds," to immunize large populations.

Where does the name "corona"-virus come from?
Correct Answer: Under a microscope the virus has a halo called a  "corona."
Choice 1: The scientist who discovered the first coronavirus liked Corona beer.
Choice 2: The coronavirus family has the the "kings" of viruses. The word "corona" means "crown" in Greek.
Choice 3: Corona was the name of the city in which the first Coronavirus was discovered.

Why does wearing a mask help prevent the spread of COVID-19?
Correct Answer: It prevents you from exhaling nfected droplets onto someone else and keeps you safe from accidentally inhaling someone else's infected droplets.
Choice 1: It makes you look unfriendly so people are less likely to get near you, and thus less likely to infect you.
Choice 2: It doesn't. People who think it does are delusional.
Choice 3: It only helps when someone is symptomatic (coughing or sneezing).

Question: A mask is effective when it covers just your mouth and not your nose.
Only medical grade masks are effective. Cloth masks do not prevent the spread of COVID-19.
Who should carry garlic to prevent the coronavirus?
Choice 2: People in crowded areas. The garlic smell will make people less likely to get near you.
